User login sandbox with the correct credentials
Applied asserations After login Serach button is displayed
globally search for the lead and click on the lead

Wait unit the emailID Text is to be displyed

Click on save button
logout from the account

global search for the lead after the sales login

fill the values of the dropdown after the qulified lead
